ch0284_40_seki/0101_0701_01_10:
You look cheerful, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Me, you ask? Can’t you tell just by looking?
ch0284_40_seki/0101_0701_02_10: Come on! Let’s go liven up the dance floor!
ch0284_40_seki/7101_0701_01_10: This dance garb sure is, uh...modern, huh? I like it!
ch0284_40_seki/7101_0701_02_10:
I wish I could give outfits like this to the rest of the
Diamond Clan, too...
ch0284_40_seki/7101_0701_03_10:
I can think of a guy this would really look
good on.
ch0284_40_seki/7102_0701_01_10:
Ursaluna’s a Pokémon that evolves from Ursaring,
you know!
ch0284_40_seki/7102_0701_02_10: Or at least it did back in Hisui.
ch0284_40_seki/7102_0701_03_10:
I’m not sure why the flow of time changed all
that...
ch0284_40_seki/7103_0701_01_10: Time sure flies in this era.
ch0284_40_seki/7103_0701_02_10:
Information spreads in the blink of an eye, and
the world keeps on changing.
ch0284_40_seki/7103_0701_03_10:
It’s exciting to watch unfold but pretty tough to
keep up with!
ch0284_40_seki/7104_0701_01_10:
Nature has its own kind of music, you know—and
it’s pretty good!
ch0284_40_seki/7104_0701_02_10:
The sound of wind, the cries of Pokémon echoing
through the air...
ch0284_40_seki/7104_0701_03_10:
Try listening for its little melodies yourself
sometime—you can hear them anywhere!
ch0284_40_seki/7105_0701_01_10:
If you just stand around waiting to strike it lucky,
time will pass you right by.
ch0284_40_seki/7105_0701_02_10:
I believe that if you want to live without regrets,
you need to make your own luck.
ch0284_40_seki/7105_0701_03_10:
But I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0284_40_seki/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, you’ve come at the perfect time! This is
for you!
ch0284_40_seki/1701_0702_01_10:
Don’t hesitate to use it—I can always bring some
more!
ch0284_40_seki/2501_0701_01_10:
The dances of this era are certainly different from
any of the ones I know.
ch0284_40_seki/2501_0701_02_10:
The speed—or maybe tempo?—is like nothing I’ve
ever seen.
ch0284_40_seki/2501_0701_03_10: But I like it! I can really get into the “groove”!
ch0284_40_seki/2501_0702_01_10:
The dances of the future might be even faster
than the ones from this era...
ch0284_40_seki/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s an exciting thought—people pushing the
speed of dance to the limit!
ch0284_40_seki/2511_0701_01_10:
Ursaluna seemed about as taken aback by this
era as I was.
ch0284_40_seki/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s taken some time, but I think he’s gotten used
to it.
ch0284_40_seki/2511_0701_03_10: Me, on the other hand...I’m still trying to catch up.
ch0284_40_seki/2511_0702_01_10:
If you really think about it, Pokémon and humans
have a lot in common.
ch0284_40_seki/2511_0702_02_10:
Each has a unique potential to grow and change
over time—in different ways, of course, but still!
ch0284_40_seki/3001_0701_01_10:
Waking up early is great! It’s an effective use of
your time, and the early bird catches the worm!
ch0284_40_seki/3003_0701_01_10:
Right, let’s do what we have to while the sun’s
still out!
ch0284_40_seki/3005_0701_01_10: Is that the time already? Time flies so quickly...
